name: The Tiny Button
description:
The Tiny Button is a very short point and click adventure game for kids, based on a story by Roberta Romano, developed by Leafdog Games for the Adventure Jam 2016 (#AdvJam2016).

When Carl receives a tiny white button - sad because he'd like to be colored - as a gift, he wants to paint it to make it happy and give it to his friend Maggie.
But then something goes wrong with the colors!

This little game was made in a very short span of time, therefore there may be few bugs we're not aware of. Leave us a message if you find any!

Thanks for playing and congratulations to all the other jammers!
